REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2624 reute h f BC-ZWEIG-FUND-<ZF>-SAYS 10-20 0045

TEXT.TITLE: ZWEIG FUND <ZF> SAYS ASSET VALUE STILL HIGHER
TEXT.BODY: Zweig Fund said as of the market's close on October 19 its asset value was 9.67 dlrs per share, down from 10.29 dlrs before yesterday's large selloff but 13.7 pct ahead of asset value at the sart of 1987. Reuter
